level.heading: FILING AN APPLICATION FOR CERTIFICATION (ยง 15-2502)

level.text: A party seeking to provide local exchange service in the District of Columbia shall file with the Office of the Commission Secretary an original and fifteen (15) copies of an Application, which shall include a detailed Statement of Business Operations (“Statement”). A copy of the Application shall also be filed with the Office of the People’s Counsel on the same date that the Application is filed.
The Application shall be accompanied by a check in the amount of $1,000 made payable to the Treasurer of the District of Columbia. This fee is non-refundable.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 2601(April 14, 2000).
